posts.text: another benefit to an approach like this is that you'd get timestamped progress, which would make it a lot easier to catch lazy cheating.

I'm NAL, but I am a native english speaker and functionally a professional computational linguist. Your friend is wrong and has it backwards.

The term "line" in this context is a stand-in for a "queue", an abstract object which has a capacity. Items are not "on" a queue, they are in it.
